title: Inside Training | Final session before Sevilla
body_text:
On Monday, our players prepared for their Champions League game against Sevilla at London Colney, and you can see what they got up in Inside Training.
Mikel Arteta ran his players through some final drills before the squad and staff headed to Luton Airport and jetted off to Seville, where they'll take on the reigning Europa League winners on Tuesday night, aiming to get back to winning ways in the group following our defeat in Lens last time out.
You can see what our cameras caught before the trip by pressing play on the video above.
